column4: i see like i have two kenel installed in my computer i find this when i start the computer ho to correct it any body help
it's ok to have more than one kernel; most people keep two around, in case there's problems with the latest
but if you really want to remove one (the old one!) you can do it with synaptic
ok so let me leave this because i dont have problem with it
in case of problem it might be my advantage thanks for your explanation
the second issue i face is when i press power down button then after it comes up i dont find shutdown or restart how can i recover this
shutdown my computer using terminal comman if am require to do it
do you see the shutdown button on the login screen?
i see logout lock screen hibernet and suspend only
the one I'm talking about is the one you see on first starting the computer; if you use logout now, you'll be at the screen I'm talking about
iven there i dont find them
ok, go to system->admin->login window, and check on the local tab: does it have the 'show actions menu' enabled?
it was not select what should i select it?
yes, then log out, hit ctl-alt-backspace (to restart the login window for sure) and check for the shutdown button
thanks i have succeeded the exercise
